Basic Attack

Standard

+21 vs AC; 2d6+8 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+21 vs AC; 2d10+6 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Melee or ranged

Athis makes two short sword or two longbow attacks, and he shifts 1 square before each attack.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 20/40

+19 vs Fortitude; 3d10+6 damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends) and knocked prone. Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Cold

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 5

+19 vs Reflex; 2d6+6 cold damage.

Encounter

Minor

Athis gains resist 10 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder until the end of the encounter.

Minor

Trigger: When first bloodied

Athis's attacks target Reflex until the end of his turn.

At-Will

Minor

Athis designates one target as his quarry. If he hits his quarry with an attack, that target also takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Minor

Athis sheathes one weapon and draws another.
